thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Katrina Edwards
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Katrina Edwards

author: Katrina Edwards
title: Katrina Edwards
text:
It was very helpful, made me feel like a VIP walking throuugh the station.
Would only recommend if you are planning to city hop or use the shinkansens because is expensive. If planning to stay in one city, buying subway tickets and local tickets will be cheaper in the long run
